backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, access control, and storage with CRUD operations and role management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a lobby caching fix with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including hooks, components, pages, styles, and config.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring cache-busting meta tags and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root configuring TanStack Router routes, layout with header/footer rules, 404 handling, and theme/toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog supporting uploads, GIF search via Giphy, avatar update/remove actions, and debounced search.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat area rendering messages, pinned videos, reply flow, autoâ€‘scrolling, header collapse, and message sending logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media thumbnails, live status, and Twitter/Twitch/YouTube preview handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, category, media upload, and video/Twitter URL validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple site footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder component that renders nothing; authentication is intentionally disabled.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with reactions, pinned video handling, Twitter embeds, and reply support.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing messages with optional media uploads, video/Twitter links, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with waveform visualization, play/pause control, duration handling, and synchronized playback across messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures chatroom data is freshly refetched when the actor becomes ready by purging stale cache entries and triggering a one-time recovery sequence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines chat-related React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, profiles, reactions, and utilities for local user metadata.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, layout rules, mobile input fixes, and custom voice message slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend constants including the GIPHY API key and result limit.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility to format numbers into compact units like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search Giphy and fetch trending GIFs, mapping API results into a simplified GIF object format with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client-side image compression with resizing, quality control, and progress callbacks, returning the original file if compression is unnecessary or fails.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to build a lightweight tweet preview with caching and concurrent request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching of Twitter preview data with versioning, validation, and expiration handling.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts video or post IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generates corresponding thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page requiring password authentication to list and delete chatrooms, using React Query for fetching and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count once, handles loading and error states, and renders ChatArea when data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the lobby with chatroom lists, search, and category filtering, using debounced input and guards against empty cached results.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing persisted React Query cache problems in the lobby.
